title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4203.3 - Compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4203.3 - Compensation

State Regulations

The staff of the commission, both permanent and
temporary, shall receive such compensation for their services as may be
determined annually by the commission within the lawful appropriation therefor; and no increase or decrease in such compensation shall be made except with the
consent of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4203.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
